thread.title: Great Location for Visitors
thread.title_full: Great Location for Visitors - Review of The Westin New York at Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: xbanker
title: Great Location for Visitors
text: We stayed at the Westin Times Square in July 2011 so this review is a dated. Westin is located in the center of Times Square and guests to the hotel and city will enjoy the proximity to all of the touristy things/shops. The room was big enough to accommodate a family of 4, bigger than the W Times Square which I stayed in previously. Westin is a good pick for someone wanting to stay centrally.
